4. Pythonã€Swiftã€Kotlinä¸­çš„ä½¿ç”¨

  • Swift:

    let regex = try? NSRegularExpression(pattern: pattern, options: [])

    if let results = regex?.matches(in: acount, options: [], range: NSRange(location: 0, length: acount.count)), results.count != 0 {

    â€ƒâ€ƒfor result in results{

    â€ƒâ€ƒâ€ƒâ€ƒ let string = (acount as NSString).substring(with: result.range)

    â€ƒâ€ƒ }

    }
